Package org.richfaces.resource

RichFaces resource handling classes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CacheableResource  
    ContentProducerResource  
    Java2DAnimatedUserResource  
    Java2DUserResource  
    ResourceCodec  
    ResourceFactory  
    ResourceLibrary
    The library of resources is references as '*.reslib' resource key and it can be represented by '*.library.properties' files under /META-INF/richfaces following JSF's resource library scheme.
    ResourceLibraryFactory
    A factory used to create ResourceLibrary from given resource name and library
    ResourceRequestData  
    SerializableResource
    A marker interface, used to indicate that the class implementing this interfaces is cleared for deserialisation by the LookAheadObjectInputStream
    StateHolderResource  
    UserResource  
    VersionedResource

    Java2DAnimatedUserResourceWrapperImpl  
    Java2DUserResourceWrapperImpl  
    MediaOutputResource  
    PushResource  
    QueueResourceLibrary
    This is a modified version of AjaxResourceLibrary that renders just richfaces-queue.js resource when it is configured.
    ResourceFactoryImpl  
    ResourceHandlerImpl
    RichFaces-specific ResourceHandler.
    ResourceKey
    Encapsulates resource name and resource library
    ResourceLibraryFactoryImpl  
    ResourceParameterELResolver  
    ResourceSkinUtils
    Utility class for manipulation with skin dependent resources.
    ResourceUtils  
    ResourceUtils.NamingContainerDataHolder  
    StaticResourceLibrary  
    URLResource
    Implementation of Resource which serves resources from absolute path.
    UserResourceWrapperImpl  
    Xcss2EcssConverter  
    Xcss2EcssConverter.CreateParser  
    Xcss2EcssConverter.FilterReader
    FilterReader converting xcss content to ecss content

    Can be usefull with ant copy task to convert a bunch of xcss files.
    Xcss2EcssConverter.Handler
